idea-plugin.name: Component Generator
idea-plugin.description:
A PhpStorm plugin for fast frontend component generation.

This plugin allows you to quickly create frontend components directly from PhpStorm. Just click Create Component and enter a name â€” the plugin will:

  • generate .scss and .js files for the component;
  • automatically register the component in personal.libraries.yml.

Ideal for speeding up development and reducing repetitive boilerplate.
